input.sentences: mom and daughter went to an early movie then arrived for dinner .
their hosts were a lovely couple .
they had all seen the movie though some did n't like as much as others .
the daughter finished up the last of the wine and they called a cab .
output.sentences: My friend and her mom went to her colleague's house for dinner before the movie premier.
The hosts of the dinner party were a lovely young couple.
They all got a little tipsy from the wine at dinner.
They were having such a good time, they didn't make it to the movie.
My friend's mom finished her wine before her own daughter!
